++ SystemInformation

SI is [Information] that is a available regarding TheSystem as a NoBaseTaskDownload and RegardNormal. This information is important to IssueDetection. [Portalling] is used to present specific SI.
    
    [Hardware]
     * Hardware sensors: temperature
     * Control of fans, voltages
     * Motherboard

    * [Hardware]
    * SystemManagement

    [Files]
     * Consumption: Largest files on disk
